Class Flight

  • java.lang.Object
    • Flight

  • public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a blueprint for a Flight object. It requires a Pilot object and an AirPlane object.
    Since:
    30/03/2018

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Flight(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination, java.lang.String dateOfFlight, AirPlane airplane) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AirPlane getAirplane()
      This method returns the airplane object created in the method setAirplane which took four parameters.
      java.lang.String getArrivalTime()
      This method returns the arrival time assigned in the schedule method.
      java.lang.String getDateOfFlight()
      This method returns the date of a flight which was assigned in the constructor.
      java.lang.String getDepartureTime()
      This method returns the departure time assigned in the schedule method which takes two parameters.
      java.lang.String getDestination()
      This method returns the destination of a flight assigned in the constructor.
      java.lang.String getOrigin()
      This method returns the origin of a flight assigned in the constructor.
      void schedule(java.lang.String arrivalTime)
      This method takes one parameter to assign or update the arrival time.
      void schedule(java.lang.String arrivalTime, java.lang.String departureTime)
      This method takes two parameters to assign the arrival time and departure time consecutively.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method overrides the toString method in the Object class.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrigin

        public java.lang.String getOrigin()
        This method returns the origin of a flight assigned in the constructor. origin is from which airport the airplane took off.
        Returns:
        origin (String)

      • getDestination

        public java.lang.String getDestination()
        This method returns the destination of a flight assigned in the constructor. destination is to which airport the airplane landed.
        Returns:
        destination (String)

      • getDateOfFlight

        public java.lang.String getDateOfFlight()
        This method returns the date of a flight which was assigned in the constructor. dateOfFlight is the day of a flight.
        Returns:
        dateOfFlight (String)

      • getAirplane

        public AirPlane getAirplane()
        This method returns the airplane object created in the method setAirplane which took four parameters.
        Returns:
        airplane (AirPlane)

      • schedule

        public void schedule(java.lang.String arrivalTime)
        This method takes one parameter to assign or update the arrival time.
        Parameters:
        arrivalTime - (String)

      • schedule

        public void schedule(java.lang.String arrivalTime,
                     java.lang.String departureTime)
        This method takes two parameters to assign the arrival time and departure time consecutively.
        Parameters:
        arrivalTime - (String)
        departureTime - (String)

      • getDepartureTime

        public java.lang.String getDepartureTime()
        This method returns the departure time assigned in the schedule method which takes two parameters. The departureTime is the second parameter.
        Returns:
        departureTime (String)

      • getArrivalTime

        public java.lang.String getArrivalTime()
        This method returns the arrival time assigned in the schedule method.
        Returns:
        arrivalTime (String)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method overrides the toString method in the Object class. It returns useful information about a flight.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representation.
